statements: UPDATE InventoryLevels SET current_stock = 50 WHERE product_id = 1;

UPDATE InventoryLevels SET current_stock = current_stock + 10, minimum_threshold = 20 WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE InventoryLevels SET minimum_threshold = 15, current_stock = current_stock - 5 WHERE product_id = 2
UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = 50 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE reorder_notifications SET notification_message = 'Low stock level' , notification_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = current_stock + 10 WHERE product_name = 'Widget A';
UPDATE reorder_notifications SET notification_message = 'Stock is running low, please reorder soon.' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE product_name = 'Laptop'
UPDATE inventory_logs SET log_description = 'Product restocked', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE inventory_items SET stock_level = 50 WHERE item_id = 1;

UPDATE products SET current_stock = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
